title: Fix incorrect office address displayed on Get Involved (Volunteer) page

requirements.text: Update the Get Involved (Volunteer) page (/get-involved) "Our Address" block so it displays the same Samarpan Trust office address text used on the Contact page and in the footer: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311".

quotes: Our address Abhi bhi so kar raha hai

acceptanceCriteria: On /get-involved, the "Our Address" section no longer shows the old Bihar address lines and instead shows the address text: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311".
The updated address is visible in the UI without requiring authentication and matches the address shown on the Contact page and in the footer.

requirements.text: Audit the frontend for any remaining occurrences of the old address text currently shown on the Get Involved page ("Vill-Bhagatpur, P.O-Bhagatpur", "P.S-Bhagatpur, Dist-Samastipur", "Bihar, India - 848503") and replace/remove them so the old address is not displayed anywhere on the site.

quotes: Our address Abhi bhi so kar raha hai

acceptanceCriteria: A site-wide search for the old address strings returns no user-visible occurrences in the built UI.
The only user-visible office address displayed across the site is consistent with: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311".

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components); compose them instead.
Do not modify immutable frontend hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this address display fix.
nonGoals: Changing any phone numbers, email, WhatsApp, or other contact details beyond correcting the displayed office address.
Adding new pages, forms, or backend storage related to addresses.
